timeline.author: losipiuk
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -322,10 +322,19 @@ public QueryAssert isCorrectlyPushedDown()
             return this;
         }
 
+        /**
+         * @deprecated Use {@link #isFullyPushedDown()} instead.
+         */
+        @Deprecated

replies.bodyText: will take care of this as a follow up
replies.author: findepi

timeline.message:
Rename isCorrectlyPushedDown() to isFullyPushedDown()

The new name better reflects the semantics.
Also, removing the old name will allow us to introduce
`isCorrectlyPushedDown`, supplementing `isNotFullyPushedDown` testing
capabilities, exposing `verifyResultsWithPushdownDisabled`.

Rename isCorrectlyPushedDown() to isFullyPushedDown()

The new name better reflects the semantics.
Also, removing the old name will allow us to introduce
`isCorrectlyPushedDown`, supplementing `isNotFullyPushedDown` testing
capabilities, exposing `verifyResultsWithPushdownDisabled`.
